answers:
The Haight is where the Hippie movement started.
Janis Joplin lived there.
Jimi Hendrix sometimes played there.

details.prompt: Tell me the history of the Haight Ashbury
requirements: The Haight was the home to the Summer of Love.
Jimi Hendrix was rumored to have lived in the neighborhood but in fact only played there.
